bootLines: [ERROR] You are not the Admin, you will be logged in as a limited guest user.

[ALERT] This is Vincenzo Oriti personal webpage for projects etc.
If you’ve left your hacker hat at home or just want to set your adventure level to 'easy', just type startx in the console below to load a normal website. Alas, just so you know, not all content will be available in noob-mode

help.response: Here are some of the available commands: about, talks, interviews, courses, publications, podcasts, contact, clear, startx, startY
